text.div:
Generated Narrative: SearchParameter condition-subject

ConditionSubjectSearchParameter

Parameter subject:reference

Searches for condition by a given subject eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/condition?subject:Patient={patientUuid}

ResourceCondition
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesCondition
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: ConditionSubjectSearchParameter
description: Searches for condition by a given subject eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/condition?subject:Patient={patientUuid}
